Sentencas: Miniaturized planar solid-oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) and stacks can be fabricated by thin film deposition and micromachining.
Titulo: Design consideration of micro thin film solid-oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Serious thermal stresses, originating in fabrication and during operation, cause thermal-mechanical instability of the constituent thin films.
Titulo: Design consideration of micro thin film solid-oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In this paper, the effect of thin film geometry on thermal stress and mechanical stability is evaluated to optimize the structure of a thin film.
Titulo: Design consideration of micro thin film solid-oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: A novel design of thin circular electrolyte films for SOFCs is presented by using corrugated structures, with which small thermal stresses and a broad design range of structure parameters can be obtained.
Titulo: Design consideration of micro thin film solid-oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Thermal transfer analysis shows that heat loss by solid conduction is serious in thin films with a small radius.
Titulo: Design consideration of micro thin film solid-oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: But thermal convection and radiation dominate heat loss in large thin films with a radius of several millimetres.
Titulo: Design consideration of micro thin film solid-oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Scale-dependent thermal characteristics show the importance of film size and packaging in optimization of thermal isolation for micro SOFCs.
Titulo: Design consideration of micro thin film solid-oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: A novel flip-flop stack configuration for micro SOFCs is presented.
Titulo: Design consideration of micro thin film solid-oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: This configuration allows multiple cells to share one reaction chamber, helps to obtain uniform flow fields, and simplifies the flow field network for micro fuel cell stacks.
Titulo: Design consideration of micro thin film solid-oxide fuel cells
